cities.name: Tokyo
cities.description: Discover the vibrant culture and modern attractions of Tokyo, Japan's bustling capital.
cities.gettingThere: Tokyo is accessible via Narita International Airport (NRT) and Haneda Airport (HND). Direct flights are available from many major cities.
cities.bestTimeToVisit: The best time to visit Tokyo is during spring (March to May) for cherry blossoms or autumn (September to November) for pleasant weather.
cities.localCulture: Experience traditional tea ceremonies, sushi-making classes, and visit local markets like Tsukiji Fish Market.
activities: Visit Akihabara for electronics and anime
Explore Odaiba for shopping and entertainment
Take a day trip to Nikko or Hakone
cities.accommodations: Options range from luxury hotels in Shinjuku to budget-friendly hostels in Asakusa.
cities.transportation: Tokyo has an efficient public transportation system, including the JR Yamanote Line and Tokyo Metro.
cities.safety: Tokyo is one of the safest cities in the world, but always be aware of your surroundings.
cities.language: Japanese is the official language. Learning basic phrases can be helpful.
cities.visaRequirements: Check visa requirements based on your nationality before traveling.

cities.name: Paris
cities.description: Paris, the City of Light, is known for its art, fashion, gastronomy, and culture.
cities.gettingThere: Paris is served by Charles de Gaulle Airport (CDG) and Orly Airport (ORY).
cities.bestTimeToVisit: The best time to visit Paris is during spring (April to June) or fall (September to November).
cities.localCulture: Enjoy French cuisine, visit local markets, and explore the city's rich history.
cities.accommodations: Options range from luxury hotels near the Champs-Élysées to charming boutique hotels in Montmartre.
cities.transportation: Paris has an extensive metro system, buses, and trams.
cities.safety: Paris is generally safe, but be cautious of pickpockets in tourist areas.
